element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm changes the values of cells in a raster layer according to a given look-up table

element.name: METHOD
element.text: Criteria should be chosen from: * Min &lt x &lt< Max * Min &lt x &lt = Max

element.name: LUT
element.text: The table contains three fields: "Minimum value", "Maximum value" and "New value", that will be used based on the previously selected criteria.

element.name: RECLASS
element.text:
Reclassified layer.
No data values are always classified are no data in the resulting layer.
If, for a given value, no class has been defined, the original value is assigned to the corresponding cell in the output layer. When this happens, a warning is added to the SEXTANTE log.
